code: import React from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./ServiceCards.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ServiceCard=_ref=>{let{title,description,price,note,buttonText,onButtonClick}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"service-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"card-title",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-description",children:description}),note&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-note",children:note}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"card-button",onClick:onButtonClick,children:buttonText})]});};const ServiceCards=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const services=[{title:"Free Will",description:"Download a blank Word document with 'Freewill.Ltd' watermarked.",buttonText:"Let's Start Your Will",onButtonClick:()=>navigate('/will-template')},{title:"Fill Online & Download (£1.95)",description:"Fill out the will online and download after PayPal payment.",note:"Will provided by Freewill.Ltd.",buttonText:"Let's Start Your Will",onButtonClick:()=>navigate('/will-form-download')},{title:"Fill Online & Printed Delivery (£4.50)",description:"Fill online, provide an address, and receive a printed document after PayPal payment.",note:"Extra postage outside the UK.",buttonText:"Let's Start Your Will",onButtonClick:()=>navigate('/will-form-delivery')}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"service-cards-section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"service-cards-container",children:services.map((service,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ServiceCard,{title:service.title,description:service.description,note:service.note,buttonText:service.buttonText,onButtonClick:service.onButtonClick},index))})});};export default ServiceCards;
